name: Jaundice
title: Jaundice
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-10 (Abdomen Computed Tomography (CT)—Use of Contrast Material), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. In calculation of OP-10, diagnoses of jaundice must appear on the abdomen CT claim to be excluded from the measure’s initial patient population.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes associated with unspecified jaundice.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with unspecified jaundice.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes associated with unspecified jaundice are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: Values that are not related to unspecified jaundice, or those captured in systems other than ICD-10, are excluded from the value set.)
